items.headline: Barcelona: Sunny, 15Â°C
items.summary: Clear skies with light winds at 5 km/h. Beautiful Sunday weather.

items.headline: A.I. Isn't Coming for Every White-Collar Job. At Least Not Yet.
items.summary: Despite hype, most knowledge workers aren't being replaced. AI adoption in workplaces is slower than predicted.

items.headline: The AI Productivity Boom Is Not Here (Yet)
items.summary: GDP data still doesn't show AI revolution boosting productivity at a macro level.

items.headline: Mistral AI CEO: Extreme Risk Warnings Are 'Distraction Tactics'
items.summary: Arthur Mensch pushes back against AI doom narratives, calling them tools used by incumbents to stifle competition.

items.headline: Opinion: AI Is an Efficiency Engine
items.summary: Making the case that AI's real value lies in cost reduction rather than job creation.

items.headline: Android Malware Uses Gemini to Navigate Infected Devices
items.summary: New research shows AI-powered malware using Google's Gemini to autonomously control Android phones.

items.headline: Predator Spyware Hooks iOS to Hide Mic & Camera Activity
items.summary: Intellexa's Predator can secretly stream from iPhone cameras and microphones while hiding all recording indicators.

items.headline: AI-Assisted Hacker Breached 600 Fortinet Firewalls in 5 Weeks
items.summary: Amazon warns a Russian-speaking attacker used generative AI to compromise FortiGate firewalls across 55 countries.

items.headline: Ex-Google Engineers Accused of Stealing Chip Security Secrets
items.summary: Three former employees allegedly funneled processor and cryptography IP overseas.

items.headline: ShinyHunters Demands $1.5M from Vegas Casino Chain
items.summary: Wynn Resorts targeted with extortion after data breach by ShinyHunters group.

items.headline: CISA: Dell RCE Flaw Exploited in Ransomware Attacks
items.summary: Federal agencies given 3 days to patch actively exploited Dell RecoverPoint hardcoded credential vulnerability.

items.headline: Govt Charges Protesters with 'Terrorism' After Labour Reform Clashes
items.summary: 17 people face terrorism charges after violent protests against Milei's labour reform bill.

items.headline: 900+ Jobs Lost as Major Tyre-Maker Fate Shuts Down
items.summary: Historic Argentine manufacturer Fate announces immediate and definitive closure of its industrial plant, leaving 920 employees redundant.

items.headline: Nearly 22,000 Companies Lost Under Milei Since Dec 2023
items.summary: Construction hit hardest amid public works freeze; 291,000 registered jobs disappeared alongside net loss of employers.

items.headline: AFA Chief Tapia Barred from Leaving Country in Tax Probe
items.summary: Court bars Argentine Football Association president from leaving the country and summons him to testify in tax evasion case.

items.headline: Textile Sector Reels as Import Surge Hits Jobs
items.summary: Over 18,000 layoffs since 2023; sector operating at one-third of installed capacity amid rising competition from imports.

items.headline: CGT Calls General Strike Against Milei's Labour Reform
items.summary: Argentina's largest labour federation announces nationwide general strike against the president's labour reform bill.

items.headline: Supreme Court Overturns Trump's Tariffs â€” Countries Scramble
items.summary: Trump responds with a global 10% tariff, considerably lower than current rates for EU, Mexico, and Canada.

items.headline: The Sinking of Cuba: 'We Are a Sacrificial Altar'
items.summary: Healthcare, education, and anti-poverty pillars of Castroism crumbling under Trump's latest blows. Only repressive apparatus remains intact.

items.headline: UK Council Faces Data Breach After Mishandling Trans Complaints
items.summary: Cornwall council passed confidential complainant details to a local politician following debate.
